sentences.sContent: He was too far away to be able to identify faces.
sentences.sCn: 他离得太远，没法看面孔认出谁是谁。

sentences.sContent: The police took fingerprints and identified the body.
sentences.sCn: 警方采集了指纹，对尸体作了身份确认。

sentences.sContent: ...The academics identify five traits that are common to the disruptive innovators: questioning...
...You may need to start by encouraging your current network to help you identify your blind spots...
...I can identify one truly impossible teacher...
...But sugar additives are not easy to identify and are hard to avoid...

synos.tran: 确定；[计]识别；使参与；把…看成一样

words.tran: 被识别的；经鉴定的；被认同者
可辨认的；可认明的；可证明是同一的
可辨认地；可看作是相同地
身份；同一性，一致；特性；恒等式
鉴定，识别；认同；身份证明
标识符，认同者；检验人，鉴定人

trans.tranOther: to recognize and correctly name someone or something
